subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The rookie Stephen Piscotty tripled and scored the go-ahead run in the eighth inning, but the run came a little too late for Michael Wacha, who allowed one run in seven innings.
snippet: The rookie Stephen Piscotty tripled and scored the go-ahead run in the eighth inning, but the run came a little too late for Michael Wacha, who allowed one run in seven innings.
